mapper.select: SELECT a.symptoms_id as symptoms_id, a.cate_id as cate_id, a.title as title , a.recommend_deptid as recommend_deptid , a.recommend_dept as recommend_dept , a.sort_order as sort_order, a.status as status, date_format(a.publish_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as publish_time, date_format(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as add_time, a.add_username as add_username, b.cate_name as cate_name, b.cate_type as cate_type FROM yw_symptoms a , yw_body_category b WHERE 1=1 and a.cate_id = b.cate_id AND a.symptoms_id = #{symptoms_id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO yw_symptoms ( symptoms_id, cate_id, title, introduction, treatment, diagnosis, cause, recommend_deptid, recommend_dept, sort_order, status , publish_time, add_time, add_username) VALUES ( #{symptoms_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cate_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treatment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommend_deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommend_dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort_order,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{add_username,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
mapper.update:
UPDATE yw_symptoms
cate_id = #{cate_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
treatment = #{treatment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
diagnosis = #{diagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cause = #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend_deptid = #{recommend_deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend_dept = #{recommend_dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_order = #{sort_order,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{add_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_username = #{add_username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_time = now()
WHERE 1 = 1 AND symptoms_id = #{symptoms_id}

UPDATE yw_symptoms
cate_id = #{cate_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
treatment = #{treatment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
diagnosis = #{diagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cause = #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend_deptid = #{recommend_deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend_dept = #{recommend_dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_order = #{sort_order,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{add_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_username = #{add_username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_time = now()
WHERE 1 = 1 AND symptoms_id = #{symptoms_id}
